{"id":558284743,"lang":"cpp","time":"11 months, 1 week","timestamp":1632176163,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/558284743/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Happy Number","memory":"5.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int getnext(int n){\n        int totalsum =0;\n        while(n >0){\n            int r = n%10;\n            n = n/10;\n            totalsum +=(r*r);\n            \n        }\n        return totalsum;\n    }\n    bool isHappy(int n) {\n        int slow = n ;\n        int fast= getnext(n);\n        while(fast!=1 && slow !=fast){\n            slow = getnext(slow);\n            fast = getnext(getnext(fast));\n        }\n        return fast == 1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"happy-number"}
